section_text: 2 1 The provisions specified in Schedule 1 to this Act shall have effect subject to the amendments there specified, being amendments consequential on the attainment of independence within the Commonwealth by the New Hebrides. 2 The enactments and instruments mentioned in Schedule 2 to this Act are hereby repealed to the extent specified in column 3 of that Schedule.
4 1 This Act may be cited as the New Hebrides Act 1980. 2 Section  2 and Schedules 1 and 2 shall come into force on the appointed day.
